Topic.Title: Won't let me "speak to" character with object.

Posts.EditableText: My game has an option to speak to a character with an object. All other commands work, but when I go to select an object to talk to the character, it won't let me click anything or type into the command bar. No matter what I try, it doesn't do anything. Saw a resolve for this issue on Windows, but I'm on a Mac (OSX).
Posts.HTML: My game has an option to speak to a character with an object. All other commands work, but when I go to select an object to talk to the character, it won't let me click anything or type into the command bar. No matter what I try, it doesn't do anything. Saw a resolve for this issue on Windows, but I'm on a Mac (OSX).
